channel.title: Apple - Support - Most Recent - iPhone
channel.description: Apple - Support - Most Recent - Apple Inc.

item.title: Apple security updates
item.description: This document outlines security updates for Apple products.
item.content:encoded: This document outlines security updates for Apple products.

item.title: Use AirPlay to wirelessly stream content from your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch
item.description: With AirPlay, you can stream music, photos, and videos to your Apple TV, or stream music to your AirPort Express or AirPlay-enabled speakers. And with AirPlay Mirroring, you can display your iOS screen on your Apple TV.
item.content:encoded: With AirPlay, you can stream music, photos, and videos to your Apple TV, or stream music to your AirPort Express or AirPlay-enabled speakers. And with AirPlay Mirroring, you can display your iOS screen on your Apple TV.

item.title: About the security content of iOS 8.2
item.description: This document describes the security content of iOS 8.2.
item.content:encoded: This document describes the security content of iOS 8.2.

item.title: If you can't send or receive messages on your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch
item.description: You might see an exclamation mark next to a message you try to send, or you might not receive messages that someone sends to you. These steps can help.
item.content:encoded: You might see an exclamation mark next to a message you try to send, or you might not receive messages that someone sends to you. These steps can help.

item.title: Find the serial number of your Apple hardware product
item.description: Learn how to find the serial number of an iPhone, iPad, iPod, Mac, or other Apple product.
item.content:encoded: Learn how to find the serial number of an iPhone, iPad, iPod, Mac, or other Apple product.

item.title: If Safari displays a blank page or unexpectedly quits on your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch
item.description: You might not be able to load a website or webpage, or maybe Safari quits unexpectedly while you're using it. These steps can help.
item.content:encoded: You might not be able to load a website or webpage, or maybe Safari quits unexpectedly while you're using it. These steps can help.

item.title: If you can't make or receive calls on your iPhone
item.description: You might not be able to make or receive calls on your iPhone if you have certain settings turned on, if your software isn't up to date, or if there's a problem with your network.
item.content:encoded: You might not be able to make or receive calls on your iPhone if you have certain settings turned on, if your software isn't up to date, or if there's a problem with your network.
